summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Ambica Diagnostic Center application. Backend APIs are 76.5% functional with core features working. Frontend UI loads correctly with authentication and navigation working well, but has critical booking flow UI interaction issue.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 422 validation error - user_id field required but auto-set from token
Returns 400 validation error during payment order creation

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access

critical_bugs.issue: Radio buttons not clickable due to header overlay interception

ui_bugs.issue: HTML structure warnings - span elements inside tbody causing hydration errors

design_issues.issue: Fixed header z-index interfering with form interactions

passed_tests: All main page routing (Tests, Packages, Memberships, About, Contact)
Admin panel access and all tab navigation
Time slot API logic (6:00-8:15 AM slots before 8:30 AM cutoff)
Backend API endpoints: root, auth, tests, packages, memberships, slots
Admin stats and user management APIs

critical_fixes: Fix BookAppointment component radio button clickability issue - header overlay blocking interactions
Fix backend appointment creation API - remove user_id requirement from request body as it's auto-set from JWT token
Fix payment order creation validation issues
important_fixes: Resolve HTML structure warnings in AdminDashboard table components
Adjust header z-index and positioning to prevent form interaction blocking
testing_notes: Time slot logic is correctly implemented and working
Admin and patient dashboards are functional
Core navigation and data display features working well

success_percentage.overall: 80% (major functionality present, critical UI fix needed)
